head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths STUART, CATHERINE, PH.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths STUART, CATHERINE, PH.D.

block.p: STUART--Catherine, Ph.D. Our lovely and loving Cathy. We are shocked and heartbroken. Your warmth and unwavering friendship will be forever remembered and missed. Our heartfelt embrace and love goes to you, Peter, Justin, Christina, Jim, Yael, and Ilana on your crushing loss. Sarah, Marvin, Benjamin, and Sabina
